alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Box Elder County through 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Howell, or 17 miles south of Snowville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Howell, Promontory and Golden Spike Historic Site. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
